itemDescription: British writer and motoring journalist, novelist frequently as duo with wife A. M. Williamson

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Norris (C N) Williamson (1859–1920) was a British writer, motoring journalist and founder of the Black and White who was perhaps best known for his collaboration with his wife, Alice Muriel Williamson, in a number of novels and travelogues.

response: *C. N. Williamson (Charles Norris Williamson, 1859–1920), English writer and motoring journalist
